overview: Based on the best anonymous confessions received at XConfessions.com, these 10 short films are a total celebration of the pleasures of the outdoors and modern sexuality. Included: My Roomie's Toy; La Reine Des Culottes; Slo Blo Mo Job; Dear Brother-In-Law; An Appointment With my Master; Ibiza Splash Crush; A Feminist Man; El Chico de la Playa Nudista (That Guy at the Nudist Beach); Come Fly With Me; If the Apocalypse Comes, Fuck Me.
title: XConfessions 5
